articles.description: Tiwary scored a match-winning unbeaten 104 against West Indies in December 2011 in Chennai, was subsequently dropped from the team.
articles.content:
Manoj Tiwary has said that he is yet to ask MS Dhoni why he was dropped from India’s Playing XI a match after scoring his maiden ODI century for the team.
